chain_of_thought: Mitsubishi Research Institute, Inc. (MRI) is a Japanese think tank and consulting firm that was established in 1970. It is part of the Mitsubishi Group and operates primarily in the consulting industry. The organization provides management consulting services and is recognized as a significant player in the consulting sector in Japan. Given its focus on research and consulting, it is classified under the 'NGO or think-tank' industry. The information gathered from multiple sources, including its Wikipedia page, confirms its status as a consulting firm and its affiliation with the Mitsubishi Group. Therefore, the industry classification is clear and well-supported by the data.
